solution_line_template: The total square footage from the {num_bedrooms} bedrooms is {num_bedrooms} * {sq_ft_per_bedroom} = <<{num_bedrooms}*{sq_ft_per_bedroom}={total_bedroom_sq_ft}>>{total_bedroom_sq_ft} square feet.
The total square footage of the house is {total_bedroom_sq_ft} + {living_room_sq_ft} = <<{total_bedroom_sq_ft}+{living_room_sq_ft}={total_house_sq_ft}>>{total_house_sq_ft} square feet
